cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: lining, interior, inside, internal, also written 裏|里[li3]

exm.mng: where?, somewhere, anywhere, wherever, nowhere (negative answer to question), humble expression denying compliment
in hand, (a situation is) in sb's hands
between the words and the lines (idiom); implied meaning, connotations
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
